member.name: M:graphApiService.Controllers.UsersController.Get
member.summary: Returns collection of users from Active Directory

member.name: M:graphApiService.Controllers.UsersController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get user by his objectId or userPrincipalName
member.param: Azure AD B2C user uniq identifier. Can be objectId of userPrincipalName
member.returns: User with passed identifier, or not found response

member.name: M:graphApiService.Controllers.UsersController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Delete user by his objectId or userPrincipalName
member.param: Azure AD B2C user uniq identifier. Can be objectId of userPrincipalName
member.returns: User with passed identifier, or not found response

member.name: M:graphApiService.Controllers.UsersController.Patch(System.String,graphApiService.Models.User.BaseProfile)
member.summary: Update user properties by objectId or userPrincipalName
member.param: objectId or userPrincipalName of Azure AD B2C User
